reviewText: Lots of laughs but Chonda was being real about losing her mom and making sure nothing was left unsaid in our relationships.  I loved the laughs but loved even more the reminder to get relationships up to date because life is unpredictable.
I was in the audience and this was the best time I ever had among strangers.  Chonda made my sides hurt from all the laughter.
Great price on a great DVD.  Arrived as promised and was well protected.
Great price and experience - highly recommend this seller.
Great DVD!  Showed it to my Bible study group accompanied with popcorn ! Had a blessed afternoon
A funny comedy sketch great for a girls night orwhen you just need a laugh.
Offensive to critical thinkers!
great dvd  worth having

This woman is hilarious!  She cracks herself up!  Which just makes you laugh even harder.  This video and any video she has out can just really lift your spirits when you're feeling blue.  She just speaks to you through her humor and real life stories.
I think it would be more enjoyable in person.  Maybe "you  had to be there".

This was a Christmas gift for my daughter but I've seen Chondra in person and she's hysterical! She's the perfect example of good, clean comedy!. Without the foul language or sexual references, she has you laughing til you hurt! I'd recommend this to anyone who's tired of the x-rated stuff that passes for humor these days!
Great product excellent service
another good one from Chonda!
GREAT
like her everyday attitude towards life.
Excellent product and service
Always a fun time when Chonda is in the room!  A remarkable woman of God with a powerful testimony of hope.
Poignant view dealing with grief.
Chonda is always funny.
Love Chonda!!
I GOT TWO AND GAVE ONE AS A GIFT LONNED THE OTHER ONE OUT  AND HAVN'T GOTTEN IT BACK. IT WAS THE BEST OF ALL
Love Chonda!
I have seen her in person, and she is a hoot! Love her videos!
completely satisfied  A+  A+
Ha ha ha!!!!
Love Chonda!  This performance was great.
Love Chonda
Hilarious fun! Such a great comedian!
Very uplifting.
Loved it, very funny!
I love it she is so clean honest and hilarious. I have watched it over and over and I still love it
Great clean comedy!
Good clean fun.  I really like Chonda Pierce's combination of humor with singing and sharing her life story.
funny
Chonda has been a big help to me and we have never met.
Love it
Love Chonda. So inspirational and hysterical!
Loved it. Ladies and gents get the DVD and have a serious time of laughing! Chanda is that good.
Chonda Pierce is a HILARIOUS, clean comedian!  I love her sense of humor and how she mixes real life experience with jokes.
Chonda is a hoot! We couldn't stop laughing!
Twenty of us gathered in my home to watch this.  It was wonderful with a message that everyone needs to hear.  Funny, heartfelt.  The time flew by.  We thoroughly enjoyed it.
Watched this with my sister-in-law and had some real belly laughs!
Chonda Pierce is great!
I bought this for a friend suffering from cancer and she had never smiled so much!
Chonda always makes you laugh - what else would you expect...just good fun.

Sometimes she's hilarious, and sometimes she's a little weird and preachy. It's kind of a coin toss. If you're a Christian Republican, you'll love her anyways... but I am neither. I am Southern, though, and that makes her funny about half the time.
She is outstanding.
Wonderful video, had us laughing all evening.
I laughed all the way through!! Completely clean comedy!
She is always funny.

Girls you will enjoy Rolling on the Floor laughing as you enjoy Chonda's gift to make you laugh. If you are feeling sad, stressed, or need a pick me up moment, Chonda delivers. She will make you laugh, she will make you cry!
Really great..... well, for my wife.  Definitely a chick thing, strong Christian witness.
Love it!...love her:)
Still can't figure out how to download it; I can't stream, I count on being able to D/L stuff.  Too bad, my wife loves Chonda.
LOVE this AMAZING WOMAN!!!! She has the perfect job of making all of us laugh...the BEST medicine for sure!!!
Always enjoy Chonda...she is SO funny and full of life. Love Christian comedy...very refreshing....
Funny
Great fun!
Hilarious!!!! And she has a great singing voice

Very heartwarming and it was difficult to focus knowing it was a tribute to her mother who we personally knew too.  So real displaying her feelings about events in her life so parallel to our own difficulties.  Please let Chonda know we weep with her and laugh with her just like in our own lives.
One extremely funny Christian woman. Entertaining from start to finish.
Love Chonda!!  A wonderful woman who will keep you in stitches!!
Was not one of her better comedy routines.
Awesome!!
Chonda Pierce is such a hit.  Made me laugh and cry.  Some of the comedy related to my experiences and now when I go to the ladies room and use the hand dryers it brings a smile to my face.
Christian comedy which I , personally, did not find so funny. It had some okay parts, but she's not my favorite comedian,
I just love Chonda.  This is another one of her funny videos.
good DVD
I always love to see Chonda Pierce - on video or in person!  She is funny, serious, interesting, and brings a wonderful message.
Chonda's DVDs never disappoint with great humor and a wonderful message. I love  her DVD's so much that I give them as gifts.
Good clean fun for the entire family, but best for a group of girlfriends.  Chonda is funny and her laughter is contagious.
Chonda keeps it clean and funny!! I thoroughly enjoyed this video and have mentioned it to many friends. Thank you for the great price and prompt delivery.
Had girls over from my Bible study and we had a great time watching Chonda! She is awesome! We were laughing so hard and yet the message came across loud and clear
I wanted so badly to like her because she is a Christian comedian,  but unfortunately,  I just didn't find her funny.  Just happy I rented from Amazon of purchasing the dvd

I absolutely love Chonda and her clean and witty sense of humor!  I watched her other videos during my chemo treatments and she cracked me up and left me laughing up a storm in the infusion center! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE her!!!!
It was nice to hear some comedy that I could enjoy with the family and not have to worry about the foul language that many comics seem to thrive on.
What a pleasure to see comedy without all the F Bombs. Chonda is so funny she cracks herself up. This is one DVD you could watch a few times and remember a different joke each time.

I HAD TO FORCE MY HUSBAND TO SIT THRU HALF OF THE SHOW AND THEN WE TURNED IT OFF.....
WE SAW HER ON HUCKABEE AND THOUGHT SHE WAS REALLY A HOOT...

I have been a huge fan of Chondas since the first time I saw her in concert. She just proves that comedy can be comedy without the use of profanity and profiling. I highly recommend anything Chonda has done and will do in the future to everyone..especially women! Thanks for letting me share!
It was amazing just like it always is with Chonda. She is such an inspiration to myself and so many others.
I enjoyed this title because it was clean but still funny. It wasn't just out & out hilarious but definitely worth the money to have found a stand up comedian I can watch with my whole family.
Awesome! Good wholesome entertainment for the entire family.  I would recommend it. She is truly a joy to watch.  It was great!
Perfect thanks.  So fun!
I don't consider this presentation good for the whole family. Boys definitely won't be interested in this and it is above children's knowledge or need to know info...
another good DVD by Chonda
Really enjoyed it!!!
Great video.

Chonda Pierce has had a very traumatic life, but she has turned her pain into comedy, and she does a very good job of it !  I think I've purchased every Video and DVD she has made, and have also attended some of her Concerts.  She has clean comedy, and I love her shows.
Nice clean humor
funny
Laughed until I cried, a must see for all. I want to see more of her shows on Amazon, not just this one and the ones on the Dove Channel. I would certainly watch them if you uploaded them.

Don't even bother if you're a democrat, progressive, or are really sick of cliche "girl talk" like a snoring husband and weight; she's a Paula Dean disguised as a comedian. Probably popular among the conservative right. So it that's you, go ahead "girl."
